name: Collect Cubes: Picker 3D
description:
Clean, Shift & and get Rewarded!
collect as many Cubes and objects as you can and push them into the Hole.
the Mission is to clear every stage to complete the level get rewarded!
Each Level and stage is more challenging and have Fun Features!

How to play:
- Swipe your finger to control and collect the objects
- Drag picker to right or left
- Pick everything, push them to the boxes and open gates
